extName.message: Lumberyard Client Server Game Log Sequence

extDescription.message: Compares server and client log files. Integrates them in a single sequence for comfortable debugging of your beloved game.

popup_header.message: Select the 2 logfiles from one session

popup_message_need_open_2_tabs.message: Open the 1 server and 1 client logfiles in two tabs of your browser to get 1 nice log file.
